website_summaries.verdict: Accurately resembles a real gun, making it the perfect choice for safety training.
pros: The durable plastic casing and strong metal magazine give a well made feel to the gun
Shoots through tin cans and stacks of thick cardboard with ease
Shots are powerful and remain accurate, even at long distances
The clip holds up to 15 BB's
The gun sits at a surprisingly low price point
cons: The CO2 door can be difficult to close

customer_reviews.title: Great bb gun. (UPDATE)
customer_reviews.text: Great bb gun. Magazine is a little difficult to load for my 10 y.o. son. Nice replica blowback bb pistol for target shooting. UPDATE. After 2 months of light use I had an issue with it firing properly. Most likely user error. I contacted UMAREX USA directly through their website and they had me send the gun to them. A week later I got the gun back in perfect working order. Great warranty service.
customer_reviews.author: Marty

customer_reviews.title: Great for Real World Training !
customer_reviews.text: Looks so real , Nice weight . Easy to break down to clean just like the real M&P 40 firearm . Buy two extra magazines . For real world training. Fits all M&P 40 holsters . Don't let any other reviews stop you from purchasing the awesome Steel BB Pistol !
customer_reviews.author: Tactical Officer Todd M. Gillette ( APS/IHSS )

customer_reviews.title: get this gun
customer_reviews.text: It is ridiculous how accurate and powerful this gun is. I totally recommend it to anyone who has an interest in guns. There was three things I was worried about this when I purchased the gun because of the low price. I was worried about the co2 nossle leaking, but it dosent😝 I was also worried about accuracy just fine😎 then the clip I thought it would be a cheap plastic clip but it is a medal clip that can load 18 rounds and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Alit M

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Quality! Stay Away!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this on Sept 4th. A few days ago, the fiber optic sight broke (pic 1). Then last night, the retainer clip at the base of the screw that holds the CO2 cartridge in place broke. The gun is now useless since you can not tighten the screw without the nut backing out of the gun, therefore putting no pressure on the cartridge itself (pic 2). I was told my “return window” closed on 10/4. So in other words I was screwed out of $41 by 7 days. Do NOT buy! I’ve owned numerous air pistols and have never had one break on me (especially in just 37 days)!
customer_reviews.author: Deuce

customer_reviews.title: Great gun. It is far more accurate than I ...
customer_reviews.text: Great gun. It is far more accurate than I would have ever imagined. It is fun to shoot and the feel and size make it good experience for handling the real thing. It is also good for training because of the safety, good sights, decent trigger, and handling the magazines. I have purchased some of these as gifts. Totally recommend.
customer_reviews.author: DoctorJJA

customer_reviews.title: Nice while it worked
customer_reviews.text: After 5 magazines of shooting, it stopped feeding BBs into the gun. No abuse, no silly rapid-fire stuff. It just stopped firing the BBs. It still shoots a puff of CO2. Maybe there's a BB lodged in the pathway somewhere. I tried new gas, looked for any visible obstruction... nothing. The instructions don't have anything to cover this situation other than telling you to not try to disassemble the gun yourself. Maybe yours will last longer. Nice feel, pretty accurate, fun gun while it worked.
customer_reviews.author: Customer7

customer_reviews.title: Accurate but hard to hold on target
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work as advertised and the fiber optic sight is quite accurate. Certainly more accurate than the Pinty Red Laser that I attached (which broke after several shots). Having said that; the trigger pull is quite hard which makes it difficult to hold on target while squeezing the trigger and the clip is awkward to load since the BBs have to be inserted one at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Pickpro

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Beginners
customer_reviews.text: This is my first airgun/BB gun and I'm just getting my feet wet in airsoft as well, this pistol is very easy to use and easy to get up and running. I literally opened my package 30 mins ago, and just now, I already shot it a few times in my indoor basic range I set up a few weeks ago. I own real firearms, and it has a very nice weight to it when it is loaded, and the blowback/slide action is realistic. Very good replica.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Great pistol, and for the price? WOW!
customer_reviews.text: Took it out of its formidable package, followed the operation instructions, walked out into the backyard, clicked off the safety, took aim at a bulls-eye I have nailed to a tree, and from 25 feet put a BB in the bulls-eye, just off center high diagonal right by about 1/2 an inch. From the same distance fired four more BB's and including the first shot I had about a 1.5 inch grouping. Love the sites and the heft of the pistol and it fits my hand perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Skins1950

customer_reviews.title: Great buy but needs some improvements
customer_reviews.text: Works very well for the price however you don't have a lot of room to screw down the CO2 cartridge. If you have big fingers, you may need to use a pliers and twist it quickly or you'll lose a lot of pressure while you tighten it up. Don't over-tighten though! Made a great Christmas gift. Would have been 5 stars but they can improve on the cylinder loading design in m opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Corey L.

customer_reviews.title: Smith&Wesson M&P replica 40 BB pistol
customer_reviews.text: Very very Realistic! Feels and features that are close to REAL Amazing details : Take off Slide like reall pistol Blow Back Action like real pistol Chamber check like real pistol Now ... HERE ARE THE CONS DIFFICULT TO LOAD BBs MUST USE 6mm ALLEN KEY TO REPLACE 12gram co2 Not 100% identical to 40 cal M&P ,but very close! Shoots at only 310 FPS ( quality steel BBs are recommended) Don't drop this thing! It won't ever be the same!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Hall Gruyter

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I waiting anxiously to get this for target shooting. Just cause I missed it so much growing up. I guess I forgot how terrible the accuracy and force these things produce. Either I have a malfunctioning one, or I have one that requires you to shoot targets from 10 feet away, in order to be accurate? Don't waste your time. I am disappointed. Also, I would like to point out that it's so cheaply made, you can pull the plastic off that holds the co2 with too much force. Sucks getting the thing back on.
customer_reviews.author: Shaynee

customer_reviews.title: Smith & Wesson M&P 40 .177 Caliber BB Gun Air Pistol
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst BB gun I have purchased. It worked well during the first 2 weeks, then it started losing power. I have always used brand new Daisy CO2 cylinders and have followed the manufacturer's recommendations, like discarding unused or partially used cylinders after 24 hours. Yet it has a permanent damage. Obviously the gas is not traveling to the chamber so it does not propel the beads. It has nice looks, though.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge de La Rosa

customer_reviews.title: Great trigger time piece, worth twice the price
customer_reviews.text: I honestly didn't have huge expectations for a 30 dollar bb pistol, this has really impressed me. Although weight and functions aren't quite realistic, and the trigger is awful, accuracy is outstanding. When I say outstanding, I mean the first 40-60 shots on a cylinder are on oar with accuracy from my real CZ. Shooting 1.5 inch groups from a rest at 20 M. I get roughly 100 shots out of a co2 cylinder before velocity and accuracy really start to wane significantly.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loading CO2 takes some getting used to on this.
customer_reviews.text: First off, this Air gun is very well made and works very well. I am pleased with the performance of this little CO2 bb gun. Pros: Can load the clip with 19 bb's and fires without miss firing. Mostly plastic which makes it light. Its a fun CO2 for targets and surprisingly accurate and powerful for the price (Yes, wear eye protection!!). Cons: Loading the CO2 cartridge takes some getting used to. The bottom screw for the CO2 needs to be twisted quickly to load the cartridge without blowing CO2 everywhere, it is not as easy as other CO2 pistols to load the cartridge.
customer_reviews.author: RW

customer_reviews.title: Great replica model
customer_reviews.text: This is for the blowback model. It is quite accurate replica of the real model. It has good weight and everything is built solid. Purchased as a safety precaution but not for lethal enforcement. Most criminals will turn around if they have to be put in a position where their advantage is questioned.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Bittan

customer_reviews.title: Good training pistol with decent accuracy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to introduce my girls to pistol shooting. It arrived yesterday and so far so good. Nice accuracy of the box. Mine shoots a little to the right so I will adjust the sights later. I like that the rear sights have fiber optic dots...wish the front was as well. Appears to use the same magazines as the Crosman 1911 co2 pistol. Double taps within an inch group at 7 yards. All shots grouped inside the lid of an oatmeal cannister..most would have been inside of a soup can.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Vaccaro

customer_reviews.title: A little costly but wanted the weight of this. Hard to load ( much easier in cheap daisy bb pistol)
customer_reviews.text: Used a few times when got...all ok...pain in the butt to load the bb's. Now took out to use (Warmer day) and the air cylinder wont hold air when inserted. Like the rubber isn't there, but it is. Had a professional look at it and was told it's the pistol and I should just buy another. I paid $80 for this and think it should be fixed by the company. UPDATE- contacted seller AMD they were very helpful! Good customer service
customer_reviews.author: June M.

customer_reviews.title: don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: The truth is I was very disappointed, I only used it two times and after that it no longer worked, when I put a CO2 in the magazine it throws all the gas, the grip of the spring to recharge the magazine is very small and it is very difficult to recharge Another bad design is to be able to change the co2 you have to always bring a key with you, if you do not bring it you will not be able to replace the cartridge,
customer_reviews.author: Junior

customer_reviews.title: finicky co2 cartridge loading.  not an airgun for beginners.
customer_reviews.text: compared to other airguns with similar or better velocity, this one looks sharp, but has a flimsy plastic handle slide to reveal and reload a co2. the tightening bolt is in a tight space and if you're not quick you'll lose some pressure form the cartridge, reducing the velocity/amount you can use the cartridge for. nice sights for shooting and great replica airgun if that's important to you.
customer_reviews.author: doug

customer_reviews.title: takes some work
customer_reviews.text: Defective product. CO2 cartdrige loses pressure after a few shots, slide gets stuck, magazine drops on its own, very hard to load with BBs... you name it. ***UPDATE*** Turns out CO2 issues are common and you need to learn how to fix the O-Ring to keep it in good shape... I will give umarex another chance and try the one with the 8 round disc.
customer_reviews.author: Brian J. Thorne

customer_reviews.title: Perfect. I love this hand gun for running drills ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. I love this hand gun for running drills in my yard. It's almost identical to the real thing.
customer_reviews.author: brian k bates

customer_reviews.title: Feels just like my M&P Fullsize
customer_reviews.text: Feels just like my M&P Fullsize, just without the report. Greta for practice, trigger control, sight alignment practice, draw and dry fire drills, etc. It looks os much like the real thing, I purposely keep the in separate spaces to ensure I don;t ever grab it in an emergency (or vice versa). Love the full action slide, akes practice much more realistic.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Valente

customer_reviews.title: Great air gun
customer_reviews.text: Just got the smith and wesson m&p 40 co2 in the mail today. This gun is awesome. Let me say I bought the glock 17 gen 4 last week and it shoots 2 shots and stops having to recock to shoot again. Cotacted seller told me to grease it lol it was brand new. This gun is firing perfect wish I bought this one begore the glock 17 gen 4. Trust me buy this one.
customer_reviews.author: sean belanger

customer_reviews.title: Looks Good, Shoots Bad
customer_reviews.text: Nice look and feel and easy to load but you can see the BBs veering left and right as they leave the barrel. Only the first 20 shots are remotely accurate. After that, the CO2 doesn’t pack enough umph to shoot straight at all. That leave around 60 shots going everywhere but the target. I guess I could stand 5 feet away and it would be okay.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Derek To You

customer_reviews.title: big disappointment,  gun leaks co2 and the barell also jams with 3 bbs
customer_reviews.text: I love the gun. i hate that it dosent work. the co2 leaks. it's always leaked and 3 shots i would shoot off would seal it up. now it doesn't seal at all. now 3bb's get jammed in the barrel. I wasted 12 co2's listening to pyramid air gun cleaning videos. made it worse. now I'm depressed. I looked forward to shooting that gun almost every day. had 5 pistols. down to my last one. my first ever bought. and my pneumatic AR. smh.
customer_reviews.author: Coleen

customer_reviews.title: Look no furthur this one is for you.
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a quality BB Gun with an extremely high velocity look no further, the 3 dot sight on this BB gun is fantastic. This gun is made for military and police training. The sights are fiber optic and reflect light to make them glow even in the bright sun. Because of the sights and the accuracy as well a well balanced BB Pistol. Stop shopping right here, you will not regret your purchase. Great price thanks Amazon
customer_reviews.author: amber

customer_reviews.title: Not quite as I expected
customer_reviews.text: So after using it once to shoot exactly two magazines of BBs, I can say it shoots pretty well. Has some power, but the BBs wander a bit and occasionally misfire. Also the plastic grip feels cheap and C02 compartment doesn't stay closed like it should (and did at first). It's an OK air gun, has decent weight and realistic look and feel (if plastic can feel real). Probably wouldn't purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Hard to tell from the real thing!
customer_reviews.text: Overall build and fit and finish is remarkable for an air pistol. The engineering, though, for the loading gate on the magazine is abominable!!!! I made a tool from an old stainless dental probe and can now draw the spring fully but still need a third hand to load the bb's. We will use the gun mainly for dry firing practice for my wife who carries the real thing.
customer_reviews.author: Dave from Mercer

customer_reviews.title: Best bb gun for the money
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the most accurate c02 bb gun I've ever shot. The magazine is a little hard to load and figure out but once you get it. You will shoot this gun all day long. If for some reason you accidentally shoot your self it is going to hurt and leave a scar. I had to buy another because I loved the first one so much
customer_reviews.author: Dylan fisher

customer_reviews.title: Great target Practice for Women...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for me , I live on the water when where I have snakes , and some other unwanted guest in my yard some I want to kill and some I just want to run off , this has the power to kill and the sound to do both .... a great buy ... and will buy again , I have owned several of these over the years but this one is perfect for a woman to handle and learn to shoot a real hand gun control... I have but real pistols and co2 , this is a little lite weight compared to the real Smith & Wesson but much cheaper to target practice with ...
customer_reviews.author: Laura...

customer_reviews.title: Maybe I just got a dud??
customer_reviews.text: Lets just say umarex has TERRIBLE quality control. Gun leaked and wouldnt cycle. On top of that, the thing that screws into the mag to keep the CO2 in broke, and would no longer screw in. Then, when I kept trying to fix it, the thing that kept the bb spring in place popped out in my face. Getting the replacement soon, if that one sucks im buying another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Ben angel

customer_reviews.title: Good gun great price shipped fast
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice m&p replica bb gun bought this for my son to start teaching him how to safely handle a firearm as a bonus it will actually fit most full size M&P holsters so i use it for re holstering drills you get a good amount of shots from each co2 its decently accurate it dose have some bb's stray off as always safety first wear glasses an do not point this gun at anything you dont want a hole in
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Great practice gun.
customer_reviews.text: Great pistol. Works and handles like a more powerful gun. Use it for practice shooting. Real cheap to use as a practice pistol. Bought 3 for family shooting contest as Christmas gifts. Lots of fun and some surprise shooters in the family. Regards Dan
customer_reviews.author: D. Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Extreemly disappointed with the Quality of this Air pistol and poor customer service
customer_reviews.text: Arrived broken with damage to the bottom and the BB clip is not stable in place. I am overall very disappointed with the Quality of this Air pistol. I am surprised Smith and Wesson would even allow their name to go on such a cheap product even if it is for just training purposes. Unusable and would like a refund.Amazon refuses to refund cost
customer_reviews.author: abb

customer_reviews.title: great practice pistol
customer_reviews.text: look , feel, weight and functionality equal to the real thing if you need a pistol for training this is perfect but don't expect accuracy , the sights are non adjustable and it shoots 6-8" low i wish it came with elevation adjustment then it would get 5 stars but overall this is a great training pistol
customer_reviews.author: lf

customer_reviews.title: Fair pistol
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice and feels nice, but you’ll waste half of your co2 catriges due to the malfunction we’re it empties out entire co2’s at a time. Great blowback feature I believe I may have a faulty pistol.
customer_reviews.author: Jalen

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, not easy to use
customer_reviews.text: You can feel the quality of this product as soon as you unbox it. It looks and behaves like a real mp .40 which is a fun experience for a bb gun. The only downside is loading the bb's. The spring is very hard to hold down while loading and unlike other BB guns, there is no catch l. So be prepared to lose both your thumbnails about 3 reloads into this product.
customer_reviews.author: Texan

customer_reviews.title: if loading BBs easier this is a perfect replica air gun for me
customer_reviews.text: very good quality. with a laser sight it's pretty accurate. without laser sight, it shoots a little lower and the sight can only adjust windage but no elevation. one 12g crosman CO2 cartridge can shoot about 40~50 rounds. the only thing I don't like is loading BBs.
customer_reviews.author: Lei Liu

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love it. Loads of fun to shoot
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love it. Loads of fun to shoot. The realism is amazing. The only downside I found with the Umarex Smith & Wesson M&P Blowback Air gun pistol is the loading the co2 cartridge into the magazine. It's a pain in the ass screwing it in straight. And leaks in the magazine co2 nozzle. Other than that its a winner.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Westbrooks III

customer_reviews.title: Poor design of puncture mechanism
customer_reviews.text: Overall it is an ok airpistol. My biggest complaint is the puncture mechanism. The screw cap is really hard to twist back on and literally requires an Allen wrench to do this. It literally takes me 20 min in between changing out CO2 cartridges. Its a shame because I would give it 5 stars otherwise
customer_reviews.author: Duff

customer_reviews.title: Accurate enough for pesky flies.
customer_reviews.text: Neat little BB pistol. We use this while camping for fly control. It maintains the CO2 pressure very well when not in use. Overnight in fact. I don't know if we just got a real good one, but it is very very accurate. A much better bb gun than the blowback bb pistols we have had. Easier to load than most clip fed bb or airsoft guns. For the price, it's money well spent. The only downside to some is that the cool but pointless blowback feature isn't there.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Build, Bad Front Sight
customer_reviews.text: This gun feels nice and has a very high build quality. My only problem with it is that the white dot on the front site is clearly off-center. There is a rounded indentation for it to be placed in and it is at the far NW corner instead of being in the middle. Time will tell how difficult this makes it to aim, but it's probably not worth returning it for.
customer_reviews.author: The Choosy MooseTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful BB Gun
customer_reviews.text: Very good gun. It’s very sturdy. Very accurate. When you put co2 canisters in I shot 5 magazines accurately. Co2 last long. The only thing I don’t really like is the slide it doesn’t pull back. But that’s fine. The sights are pretty cool. Never really owned fiber optic sights. Over all it’s a really good gun.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel Zuber

customer_reviews.title: Great gun if you can get past it constantly jamming.
customer_reviews.text: Overall it's just an OK pistol. It is powerful due to being Co2 powered. However, it jams...a lot! Just about everytime i load it i'm jamming at least twice and have to pull the little magazine out and a bb will fall out and then ill put the magazine back in and keep firing until the next jam. I probably wouldn't buy it again because of this. Looks cool though, and doesn't feel super cheap.
customer_reviews.author: K Sweeten

customer_reviews.title: Umarex S&W MP 40
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful looks and feel , looks a lot like the real thing . It's hard to load you need strong fingernails my wife can't load it . It shoots 3 to 4 inches low at 10 yards . Sometimes it does not cycle . But it looks so nice I think I'll keep it .
customer_reviews.author: Dickson

customer_reviews.title: This product malfunctioned!!!!
customer_reviews.text: So when I first took this gun out, right off the bat, it had scratches. Thought no biggie, it will accumulate more later on. When i went to shoot it, it shot fine for the first I’d say 3-4 BB’s. Then it jammed up. When I took the mag out, I also noticed something new, that there was something shaking, something loose inside. I ended up just returning the product, and asking for a full refund.
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Good to practice with and work on eye dominance etc
customer_reviews.text: Initially got this to work on my eye dominance for my actual S&W M&P .40 before taking a carry class. I checked out prop guns and they costed double this. Figured I might as well pay half and have some fun shooting BBs too!
customer_reviews.author: Daveheart

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality gun or CO2 cartridge
customer_reviews.text: CO2 leaks out extremely fast. If you don’t fire all BB’s quickly you will have to replace the cartridge
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: poor trigger function
customer_reviews.text: This co2 pistol feels very nice in your hands, it has a solid feel to it. And it is Very strong, it can easily shatter tempered glass from 50 feet away (I had an accident lol). But the trigger is a joke. In order to fire it must be pulled waay back, and if it isn't a solid pull it simply won't engage the co2 and you'll have a bb roll out of the barrel. With this issue and such a heavy trigger pull your accuracy becomes garbage.
customer_reviews.author: shopper

customer_reviews.title: Nice Practice Airgun
customer_reviews.text: Have enjoyed this airgun to use around the house and doing some target practice that I can't do with my other 9mm M&P. Has close to the same feel and helps me to keep the feel of the grip.
customer_reviews.author: Commdrdave

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: This was a nice gift for my boyfriend and he even chose it. It only worked from Christmas to March. First the BB’s got stuck in it and got it jammed. Well he fixed that. Then about a week later the CO2 was releasing all the way when he would shoot his first shot. So now he has bought more CO2 and it STILL leaks out all the way. Also the BB’s are very easy to load. It was good for a very short time. And he didn’t even use it every day, just on the weekends to shoot things in the back yard. He was excited then disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Peebles

customer_reviews.title: A Lot of Fun!
customer_reviews.text: It is the best solution for shelter-in place with COVID-19 out there.
customer_reviews.author: Tao

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use hard to load CO2 cartridge
customer_reviews.text: it is as described. The magazine loading could be easier but not too bad. The CO2 cartridge loading is much more difficult. Pulling off the handle cover to get to the CO2 chamber is prone to completely snap off the cover though without damage. It take effort to put the cover back on. The loading of CO2 cartidge requires some skinny fingers as one turns the thumb screw. The thumb screw needs to be turn fast at cartridge penetration to minimize CO2 gas leakage. It is mostly a toy and something to keep the deer away from our garden.
customer_reviews.author: pedal2go

customer_reviews.title: It works as intended
customer_reviews.text: If you own an M&P/Shield or any other subcompact semi-auto this is a good tool for maintaining muscle memory. I carry it IWB and Appendix which works well since I am in a wheelchair. After a few months of practicing I can safely draw and engage targets out to 25m. Saves a pile of money and effort from going to the range and shooting the .40
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: It is hard to reload the CO2 cartridges, fingers are too big.
customer_reviews.text: For some reason the BBs get stuck inside the magazine and don't always come out when fired. The knob to secure the CO2 cartridge into place, is in a tight place and it is hard to turn the knob fast enough before losing a few shots worth of gas. Reloading is not fast at all, but the replica gun does provide me with security when I visit my tribe's land especially when signs warn trespassers that they will be shot... we had a number of vandalism issues. I like this gun and would certainly purchase another, but I hope they remake the cartridge knob to make it easier to install.
customer_reviews.author: John M.

customer_reviews.title: Decent CO2 multi-shot pistol
customer_reviews.text: It works ok but you have to be sure to quickly tighten the screw pushing the CO2 cartridge into the piercing pin or you may easily lose more than 1/2 of the charge. It takes a little practice to do it right so you have the full power at your disposal. The magazine for the BBs is nice so you can fire multiple shots in rapid succession.
customer_reviews.author: Gary F.

customer_reviews.title: reliable, and dependable!
customer_reviews.text: I have an M and P 40 in a .22 cal, and a 9 MM... so now I have the BB version. Love them all! HOWEVER... I paid close to $100 for mine, and since found them online for around $40.... check around..!!!!
customer_reviews.author: robert t goad

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Gun
customer_reviews.text: It takes for ever to load the CO2 cartridge, extremely frustrating. You cannot thread the cap with your hand when you add the wrench it just does not thread evenly. Sorry I wasted my money on this gun
customer_reviews.author: A Brown

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in a couple of things...or three
customer_reviews.text: Yes, it's a S&W M&P. No, it doesn't load like the airsoft version. Part of the hand grip slides off rear-wards to replace the CO2 cartridge. The BB magizines does drop like a standard magazine, but 1/5th the size and weight. No, the safety is a right sided slide lever, nothing like the real M&Ps. No, not happy that after the third CO2 cartridge/use, I have had every cartridge after that fail to seal. Now I have a lovely black desk paperweight that looks like a plastic M&P. Really Smith & Wesson?
customer_reviews.author: CK in VA

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: The design is poor. The mechanism for installing the co2 cartridge is absurdly hard to use. Requires a tool and great patience as it requires something to be threaded and screwed down. Very difficult. Also, the gun I received had a safety that was stuck and snapped off when trying to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Diabetic

customer_reviews.title: Shoots pretty far and is very accurate
customer_reviews.text: This was my first bb gun. Seems to be worth the money. Shoots pretty far and is very accurate. Only thing I didnt like too much is the handle and when you have to pull it open to change the co2 cartridges. In conclusion its a very good bb gun. Havent used it too much but no problems for me yet.
customer_reviews.author: Khan V.

customer_reviews.title: Okay purchase
customer_reviews.text: Cool product. I enjoy it. Unfortunately. There’s is no ‘blow-back’ (which is why I bought it in the first place). Sometimes the gun doesn’t shoot and all you hear is the CO2 being released- Not sure why. Okay purchase. I expected a bit more tho.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Villalta

customer_reviews.title: Does the job.
customer_reviews.text: I like it, i bought it to replace a Beretta replica that broke in less than two months. Very accurate and lighter than what I expected. I plan to teach my teenage niece and nephew how to use guns over the summer, and this seems to be a good choice.
customer_reviews.author: Leo M

customer_reviews.title: Don't waiste your money
customer_reviews.text: Bought one a week ago. Worked fine for one day. Got it out yesterday and tried two different CO2 cartridges and not bb fired out of the gun. BBs simply drop out when the magazine is taken out.
customer_reviews.author: Bequia

customer_reviews.title: Currently jammed
customer_reviews.text: Worked great when first tried. Noticed the spring came a little bent inside upon delivery---sigh, probably why it is jammed now. We shall see what some oil, and switch to steel does..I am not giving up on it, because it feels right for me.
customer_reviews.author: joann klonowski

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: When i got this gun out of the package, it was very nice and detailed like the real thing which is good. The bad part is when i was going to load the magazine, it was difficult to load. Not only that, when i shot the gun, it did not fire a BB. so i took the magazine out and pulled the slide back and a BB fell out like it was jammed. I wasted a total of 6 CO2 cartridges. Very disappointed. Will be getting a refund.
customer_reviews.author: John Smith

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome and matched the S&W Shield 9mm pistol I purchased for my daughter. This pistol locks into to the Safari Land locking holster. Great for marksmanship practice without shooting 9mm rounds.
customer_reviews.author: J Sawdey

customer_reviews.title: So, so.
customer_reviews.text: Very hard creepy trigger. You'll need 7 mags at 20 BB's apiece. Be prepared to buy three two packs of mags. Thats 140 shots and it will do that and more on one cartridge. By that time your fingers are sore. Accuracy is fair to middlin' for a BB slinger. Not much power but enough to bounce plastic jugs. Shots into a wood backing can and will send BB's back at you, so safety glasses are a must. Have fired several thousand rounds and it still works. To get full co2 usage one must almost use light pliers very gently to quickly pierce the cartridge. I tried it by hand and lost most of the co2. Enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: Quil 1964

customer_reviews.title: Tons of fun, no orange cap on the nozzle
customer_reviews.text: This little BB gun is a ton of fun. It looks just like the real thing and has great accuracy. It does not have an orange cap on the nozzle so keep that in mind when purchasing
customer_reviews.author: JackTop Contributor: Arduino

customer_reviews.title: Great Inexspensive Gun
customer_reviews.text: Very accurate BB gun. At 12 to 17 feet this shoots right on. Just slightly low. The CO2 lasts along time also. Very powerful. This shot thru 4 extra thick cardboard sheets. I set up an indoor range with a small, thick rug, doubled behind the paper target. Just in case, I also have three sheets of extra thick cardboard. And behind tha,t a piece of Masonite just to be sure it does not make it out the back. The only drawback is the extreme length of pull on the trigger. That is why only 4 stars. I have made up for that with my firearms experience. For the price, you can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Very impressive for the price
customer_reviews.text: First of all I can’t believe how much detail they put into this gun. From how the slide works to the way you load the magazine. The weight of the gun is even realistic. You can break down this thing just like you would break down a real gun. It’s very realistic and I think it’s a pretty good deal for the price.
customer_reviews.author: JOEY

customer_reviews.title: This matches my actual S&W
customer_reviews.text: I was really surprised that it held the CO2 charge while unused for some time! This is very useful for practice and fun. It has quite a bit of power. It is very good.
customer_reviews.author: Carole Martin

customer_reviews.title: co2 Screw threading was rung out and it stopped working after a few shots.
customer_reviews.text: for the price i expected better the screw at the bottom on the gun to pierce the co2 can wouldnt even twist when i got it to work it fired maybe 15-20 rounds before the gun refused to work anymore ..
customer_reviews.author: James Sheridan

customer_reviews.title: HECTORM16's review
customer_reviews.text: my gun came today... so far here are my ratings for this gun Accuracy-9/10........(shoots great) looks-8/10............(non blowback,very strudy plasic) grip comfort-9/10.......(all my finger fit in the grip,results may very) trigger-5/10............(trigger is a little hard its not a little squeeze and it shoots) Power-9/10..............(shot some lemons and a metal fence it makes a dent breaks glass) i like the gun it an average C02 gun its alright to buy if u want to use for close quarter combat EXTERNAL PLASTIC BODY EXCEPT INTERTERNAL PARTS BUY THIS GUN!!!! THIS ONLY SHOOTS METAL BBS .177 CAL!!!! DANGEROUS BBS BOUNCE WHEN HITTING A WALL OR ANY SOLID THING!!!! ITS NON-BLOWBACK!!!!!! any questions comment me
customer_reviews.author: hectorm16

customer_reviews.title: Nice afterall
customer_reviews.text: The Good - Feels and looks real. Nice power. CO2 cartridge is nicely hid. The bad - After a couple months of use I heard a "hissing" sound and notice the cartridge losing power quickly. For whatever reason the seal at the top of the CO2 cart developed a leak that will not stop. I thought at first it was off brand carts, but the Crosman also leaks. The handle also will get stuck...not easy to open to insert the CO2 cart. Edit 11.10.10 Well I discovered the CO2 carts need to have Pellgunoil applied to the tip of each one as they are loaded. This fixed the leaking and now am a happy camper with this gun.
customer_reviews.author: Simpleton

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty decent BB gun. It looks exactly like my M&P 22. It even has the S&W markings on it. Nice fake "fiber optic" sights,... I'm sure there just a light capturing plastic tube, but there really easy to see and appear to be pretty bright. It has a long, hard trigger pull which throws you off target somewhat though. You do have a few stray bb's that don't go where your shooting, so be carful if you use it in an indoor range or BB trap. It's a decent little gun for the price, just a little dissapointed with with the stray bb's it puts out. But again, look at the price... great for the money !
customer_reviews.author: Johno

customer_reviews.title: CO2 Connection Just Not Working
customer_reviews.text: Out of the box, loved the gun. Nice look and feel, blowback, accuracy. BBs a little tedious to load but, nothing new there. About 300 shots in, the gun simply began to misfire or no fire. Wasted 6 or 7 cartridges before calling Umarex. Customer phone care was good. Invited to send it back in. They turned it around and sent me back the same gun in about a week. It was worse! First cartridge barely worked and it was down hill from there. BB's simply wouldn't shoot and testing with a spare clip I had purchased, wasted another 4 cartridges. Very disappointing. Sent it back to Amazon for refund and moving on to a different brand of blowback.
customer_reviews.author: Freedom isn't Free

customer_reviews.title: well balanced
customer_reviews.text: this is a very cool looking pistol. The CO2 cartridge fits well. I pull the handle a bit too hard and the backing came off, it took a while to fit the enclosure back into the groove...to cover the CO2 cartridge. The cartridge allowed about 5 clips before the CO2 ran out. At 20 yards, I can see the BB to each target. The extra clips I got (also from Amazon) did not fit, even it says it can hold the plastic bb and the 0.177; but the 0.177 is too small, and they fell out; and the plastic appears too big to fit....so i just use the clip that came with. I will keeping looking for another clip
customer_reviews.author: seldom satisfied

customer_reviews.title: It jams and leaks the CO2
customer_reviews.text: I barely shot 100 pellets and: It jams frequently. I had to disassemble the barrel twice two take-ups out the jammed pellet. Leaks the CO2 while shooting. I lost two CO2 bottles while shooting. The magazine drop-off while shooting.
customer_reviews.author: Javier

customer_reviews.title: Withstood 6 months of heavy use.
customer_reviews.text: Withstood 6 months of heavy use. Slide catch ended up breaking but I'm not disappointed. Usually blowback guns have problems like that. I just don't feel like fixing it right now. Only other maintenance I've had to do is oiling the gun and fixing broken gaskets on the co2 part but that's all normal maintenance for these guns
customer_reviews.author: Hunter K.

customer_reviews.title: Best BB gun I've bought in years.
customer_reviews.text: Shoots @ 480 FPS which is very high and great for a BB gun. Shoots up to 350 yards which is insane for a BB gun. Looks very realistic and DOES NOT have that little turning key at the bottom showing like most BB guns. That piece gets covered up by the handle and in a holster it looks very close to the real thing. Weight is much lighter than the real thing but overall really spot on. Trigger feel a little tight but I'm sure it will loosen up with time.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Great Gun
customer_reviews.text: Love the blowback. Shoots about 55 bbs before running out of air. Uses air canisters. Love that it gives 2 extra back straps so you can customize the grip to your hand size. Looks good and feels good. No complaints so far after 100+ rounds.
customer_reviews.author: T.W.

customer_reviews.title: Good product but not really worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: Near exact replica, even fits into a level 3 holster designed for the real version perfectly. Pretty spendy for what it is though, for the price youd think they'd at least throw in an extra magazine considering they're selling spare mags for this at $50 a piece....
customer_reviews.author: Matt S.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it!
customer_reviews.text: This BB pistol was hard to load the CO2 cartridge without taking the handle cover off. It was hard to respond once C02 is already loaded.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. B

customer_reviews.title: It's a good, solid and reasonably powerful BB gun
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for plinking and rabbit slaughtering. It's the most humane way to slaughter meat rabbits - one quick shot behind the ears at the base of the skull and death is instantaneous. It's a good, solid and reasonably powerful BB gun. Never once had it jam or misfire. It's accurate, lightweight, and powerful.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Wilson

customer_reviews.title: What a deal
customer_reviews.text: Very powerful and accurate as can be. Will easily kill a squirel or any other small game. Smokin deal. Ive checked all bb guns and this by far is best bang for buck as far as bb pistols. Cheap enough that you cant go wrong buying this weapon. IT IS NOT A TOY! Do not buy this for a little kid it can kill a human!
customer_reviews.author: Randy from magnolia,tx.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great airgun, great price. No orange tip as BB guns are not classified as toys (Airsoft) or as firearms according to Federal rules, but they can do a lot of damage. Toys are required to have an orange tip, So if you want an orange tip (I did), I painted the tip of mine (about 1/2" or 1cm) DayGlo Orange.
customer_reviews.author: L.E.S.

customer_reviews.title: Great, inexpensive gun
customer_reviews.text: This gun is great and fun to shoot. I've only had one jam in one of my many times I have used it. The CO2 lasts long and doesn't leak. The magazine has a flawed design. The top part of the magazine has a part that would stop the BBs from exiting. You have to push it in for it to work and nudging it can easily launch all your BBs outward. Now the part has stopped working entirely and I have to release the spring after I load the mag for the BBs to feed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: best double, action for the buck's!
customer_reviews.text: hard hitting.. very accurate.. smoth bore.. punches thru steel can's like butter at 40 feet.. love it! my wife;s training pistol! laser mounted hits my steel targets even a rookie. at 60 feet.. mine pulls a little right.. typical of a smooth bore.. wort getting? DAMM GOOD!
customer_reviews.author: Rockin ROB

customer_reviews.title: Total blast
customer_reviews.text: This gun is great! Felt just like my m&p 9. Definitely wouldn't get dumb in public with it, it looks just like a pistol. It has worked great for 2 months now and I've had a blast with it. No hiccups or malfunctions.
customer_reviews.author: Levi

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to read manual, excellent size, and not difficult to hold and handle. Excellent delivery time. Super fast.
customer_reviews.author: Adriana S. Perilla

customer_reviews.title: Looks real
customer_reviews.text: Looks like the real thing. Mostly metal. I wouldn't be able to tell if it is real without close inspection.
customer_reviews.author: NoPro

customer_reviews.title: CO2 seal leaks
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine for 2 weeks then a CO2 seal somewhere within the gun failed and just leaks CO2 for a minute or 2 until the cartridge is empty. Wasted money. Get a better quality CO2 pistol like I should have done.
customer_reviews.author: B. McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Really a excellent product. I purchased this to remove a pesky ...
customer_reviews.text: Really a excellent product. I purchased this to remove a pesky squirrel that relentlessly kept trying to get into the attic. No matter what method I used to try to discourage this rodent he continued to try to get in. No problems with any other of his kin though. Anyway, this dispatched the problem quickly and quietly. This is a powerful weapon that will penetrate the skin and if hit several times it will kill small animals
customer_reviews.author: Robert Bockenkamp

customer_reviews.title: This is a pretty good co2 bb pistol
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty good co2 bb pistol. The material is good as is the grip and while I cannot confirm the speed it does shoot very strong and accurate. I only give this 4 of 5 stars because of the odd slide out grip feels flimsy when it isn't attached to the pistol. But this is probably splitting hairs. I highly recommend this to any enthusiast.
customer_reviews.author: JCE

customer_reviews.title: Co2 seal are junk
customer_reviews.text: Had this co2 bb pistol for about a week before it crapped out on me. The co2 seal went bad and S&W wont even cover it. For just under $100, I should still be using it. A replacement clip/magazine will cost me $50. Nope, wont pay that.
customer_reviews.author: Charles L.

customer_reviews.title: This is a fun air pistol
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun air pistol! It has good power and pretty consistent accuracy , I was really surprised with the accuracy! It is mostly plastic but it doesn't at all feel cheap or just thrown together. The magazine is made of metal though and that adds a bit of weight. It's not very heavy like a real pistol but like I said, it doesn't feel cheap, and it has enough weight to make you feel like you could be holding a real gun... it looks pretty real so be careful who you point it at.
customer_reviews.author: Eli

customer_reviews.title: It is an ok gun
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to use and has a lot of power. But it jams most of the time. Accuracy is ok. It will probably make 5-6 inch group At about 10 yards.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Navarra

customer_reviews.title: Awesome & Realistic
customer_reviews.text: Awesome fun little toy that looks HIGHLY realistic, quality built, and packs a punch. Will put holes through metal from 50 feet away. Not sure why anyone would have a negative review unless there was a rare defect. Buy it.
customer_reviews.author: B-Dix

product_meta.title: Smith & Wesson M&P 40 .177 Caliber BB Gun Air Pistol
product_meta.description: The Smith & Wesson M&P 40 has a dedicated following. And now M&P fans have a Blowback BB gun repeater that is perfect for training. The controls on this air pistol allow for realistic training. There’s no better way to practice holster work and the basics of accuracy. This M&P comes with replaceable backstraps to match your hand shape and size. The metal slide and slide catch work as expected and the air-gun has adjustable sights. The 15-shot drop-out mag is weighted to simulate the original, and a rail under the barrel allows addition of lights, lasers, or other accessories. If you are looking for uncompromising realism in a functional BB gun, this is it.
feature_bullets: Realistic blowback action and controls allow for realistic training; Great for practicing holster work and the basics of accuracy
Metal slide and slide catch work like the original; Features adjustable sights
Comes with replaceable backstraps to match your hand shape and size
15-shot drop-out mag is weighted to feel like the original; Integrated rail allows addition of lights, lasers or other accessories
Shoots .177 caliber steel BBs at up to 300 fps

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
